name: Perished Truth (Safe Room Demo)
description:
Perished Truth is an upcoming survival horror game looking to Revive classical horror genre with fixed camera and tank controls. The game follows 10 characters kidnapped and trapped in an abandoned facility on an abandoned island. on the way you will meet other kidnapped survivors, but are they your friends or are they your foes? will they help you battling mutants, solving puzzles and uncovering mysteries as you try to survive and escape this nightmare? or will they add to your nightmare?

for more on Perished Truth, the 3rd person action game/visual novel inspired by classic horror titles such as the Resident Evil series and visual novels like Zero Time series, check the following links:
